description: We specify more operating memory for Gradle run, because default 0.5Gb isn't enough to quickly precompile the Gradle code. Renovate allocates 3Gb RAM and 15 GB disk space
We also limit 'branchConcurrentLimit' to 3 (from default 10), because Renovate spends 4-6 minutes per each branch (why it is so slow?) and has 30 minutes global timeout
pinGitHubActionDigests is required to normalize all actions used in repository (and pin their hashes and versions)
